ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Right-click effects on armour
ygData.msgSnippet: Talies it s static effect times. problem is they aren;t standard. SS arms give invigor about 30 sec ss boots give aria of eagles 5 min levitate. ss breast
ygData.messageBody:
Talies it's static effect times. problem is they aren;t standard.
SS arms give invigor about 30 sec
ss boots give aria of eagles 5 min levitate.
ss breast plate gave 30sec song of travel don't know what it is currently.\

The really stupid part is the message is X piece glows. Would it have hurt to say sings? hums, heck even rattles?

On Mon, 04 Jun 2001 09:16:35 -0500 eqbards@yahoogroups.com wrote:
> I was just looking around and noticing that there are certain effects on
> Bard armour that... well.. confuse me.
>
> Resonant / Melodic breastplates both bear the effect Selo's Song of
> Travel. How does this work? Does it stay "clicked" until you zone or does
> it last a certain amount of time? I'd really hate to have to start
> twisting armour ;)
>
> Talies the Wanderer
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
> with the subject submissions.
